Description: I have lowered my price for the Holidays it’s a great guitar for the price! I am offering this 2012 Gibson Moderne,trans-Amber solid body, right-handed six string electric guitar. I’m not a guitar dealer, but I’m a guy that loves guitars and this was a great iconic guitar to own. I took good care of it now someone else can enjoy it as I look to buy some different stuff. The Moderne is made to the precise Pre-space-aged-retro shape that made the original so eye catchingly hip with the elements of the flying V’s look, but with an asymmetrical lower bout that makes the guitar much easier to play sitting down. Finished Trans Amber with genuine nitrocellulose lacquer with the gold plated hardware. The body is Craft’d from solid grade a mahogany with a solid quarter zone create a mahogany neck glued in the with Gibsons claimed deep set neck joint the neck is curve to a slim fast profile that measures 800 point degrees at the first fret in .850 at the 12th and topped with a fingerboard made from exotic granadillo. The Moderne’s headstock follows the rare split top design has also seen on the extremely scarce explorer models from the first year of production. A pair of 57 classics loaded on the modernist series of guitars in the late 50s these popular pick ups classics capture the sound of the original PAF humbuckers. The timeless pairing of tuna Matic bridge and stop bar tailpiece both and gold anchor is the strings at the body and for solid stain and precise intonation adjustment a set of gold plated vintage style tuners with pearLlyod buttons retain the accurate look and performance up at the headstock. includes the hardshell case with paperwork.The guitar is in super shape and barely has any signs of use or wear. It has one small ding on one of the tips. I’m also including gold shaller strap locks and a premium Walker & Williams leather guitar strap. The opening bid is lower than I paid for the guitar this is a chance to get a great guitar at a great price. I am selling a few very nice guitars. I only ship to the continental United States USA only the lower 48! I ship as soon as the funds clear! PayPal only! All sales are final! I ship with UPS ground!No returns accepted! Thanks for looking!
Title: 2012 Gibson USA Moderne Limited Run Trans Amber Electric Guitar + OHSC
